public class LoginPacketCreator
extends java.lang.Object

A tool for creating MaplePackets for login.

getHandshake

public static MaplePacket getHandshake(short majorVersion,
                                       short minorVersion,
                                       byte[] sendIv,
                                       byte[] recvIv)
Gets the basic introduction packet to send to new clients.

Parameters:
majorVersion - the major version number
minorVersion - the minor version number
sendIv - the initialization vector for sent packets
recvIv - the initialization vector for received packets
Returns:
the basic introduction packet to send to new clients

getLoginSuccess

public static MaplePacket getLoginSuccess(MapleAccount account)
Gets the packet for a successful login action. See packet documentation on CLogin::OnCheckPasswordResult for more information.

Parameters:
account - the account of the user logging in
Returns:
the packet for a successful login action

getAccountUnverified

public static MaplePacket getAccountUnverified()
Gets the packet for a failed login action because the account is unverified. See packet documentation on CLogin::OnCheckPasswordResult for more information.

Returns:
the packet for login failure for an unverified account

getLoginFailed

public static MaplePacket getLoginFailed(byte reason)
Gets the packet to display a login failed message. See packet documentation on CLogin::OnCheckPasswordResult for reason.

Parameters:
reason - the reason the login failed
Returns:
the packet to display a login failed message.

getKeepAlive

public static MaplePacket getKeepAlive()
Gets the packet to trigger a KeepAlive event with a client.

Returns:
the packet to trigger a KeepAlive event with a client
